thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Of America Says Will Open More Than 500 New Financial Centers Nationwide Over Next 4 Years

title: BRIEF-Bank Of America Says Will Open More Than 500 New Financial Centers Nationwide Over Next 4 Years
text: February 26, 2018 / 7:03 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Bank Of America Says Will Open More Than 500 New Financial Centers Nationwide Over Next 4 Years Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Bank Of America Corp: * BANK OF AMERICA CORP SAYS CO WILL OPEN MORE THAN 500 NEW FINANCIAL CENTERS NATIONWIDE OVER NEXT FOUR YEARS * BANK OF AMERICA CORP SAYS COâ€˜S PLAN INCLUDES LATEST MOVE TO ENTER STATE OF OHIO TO OFFER RETAIL BANKING SERVICES IN CINCINNATI, CLEVELAND, COLUMBUS * BANK OF AMERICA CORP SAYS PLANS TO REDESIGN MORE THAN 1,500 FINANCIAL CENTERS WITH NEW TECHNOLOGY, FURNISHINGS, LAYOUTS Source text ( bit.ly/2HPbPEg ) Further company coverage:
